types:type.name: Order
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type Order = {| orderNumber: Number {"typeId": "int"}, orderDate: String, storeNumber: Number {"typeId": "int"}, orderChannel: String, orderType: String, subtotal: Number {"typeId": "int"}, discount: Number {"typeId": "int"}, tax: Number {"typeId": "double"}, total: Number {"typeId": "double"}, id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, name: String, frequency: String |} {"example": "{\\\"orderNumber\\\":9998,\\\"orderDate\\\":\\\"03232022\\\",\\\"storeNumber\\\":11,\\\"orderChannel\\\":\\\"App\\\",\\\"orderType\\\":\\\"Mobile\\\",\\\"subtotal\\\":20,\\\"discount\\\":5,\\\"tax\\\":0.9,\\\"total\\\":15.9,\\\"id\\\":99999,\\\"name\\\":\\\"Max Mule\\\",\\\"frequency\\\":\\\"New\\\"}"}

types:type.name: OrderType
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type OrderType = {| orderNumber: Number {"typeId": "int"}, orderDate: String, storeNumber: Number {"typeId": "int"}, orderDetails: {| orderChannel: String, orderType: String, total: Number {"typeId": "int"} |}, guestDetails: {| id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, name: String, frequency: String |} |} {"example": "{\\\"orderNumber\\\":220011,\\\"orderDate\\\":\\\"03232022\\\",\\\"storeNumber\\\":11,\\\"orderDetails\\\":{\\\"orderChannel\\\":\\\"App\\\",\\\"orderType\\\":\\\"Mobile\\\",\\\"total\\\":25},\\\"guestDetails\\\":{\\\"id\\\":12466,\\\"name\\\":\\\"MM\\\",\\\"frequency\\\":\\\"New\\\"}}"}
